DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to identify risk factors for low lymphocyte count among patients with type 2 diabetes who are treated with oral antidiabetic drugs.
DOC.brief_title: Risk Factors for Low Lymphocyte Count in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Involving a secondary analysis of data collected prospectively from a defined cohort, for the SAVOR trial.
DOC.criteria: Enrolled in SAVOR Diagnosed with T2DM Baseline HbA1c â‰¥6.5% (based on the last measured and documented laboratory measurement within 6 months) Age 40 or older High risk for a cardiovascular event Not enrolled in SAVOR Current or previous treatment with DPP4 inhibitors and/or GLP1 or incretin mimetics. Acute vascular event Pregnancy HIV/AIDS Severe autoimmune disease Current chronic steroid use
